event.name: Aria's Fall; Week 1
event.desc: Follow the events leading to Aria's fall against the corruption that took control of her mind.

event.name: Aria's Fall; Week 2
event.desc: Continue Aria's adventure as she uncovers what lies hidden in the Salt Wastes.

event.name: Aria's Fall; Week 3
event.desc: The conclusion of Aria's Fall to the corruption that took control of her and sent her on a collision path with Elaria!

event.name: Tarragon Peak
event.desc: You receive a plea for help as calamity strikes the dragon home of Tarragon Peak!

event.name: Dragon's Deceit
event.desc: Treasure and betrayal await you in the second chapter of Tarragon Peak!

event.name: The Dragon Egg
event.desc: A second quake strikes, leaving the fate of the peak in question. Find the rare Dragon's Egg and hatch a dragon of your own!

event.name: Tarragon Conflict
event.desc: The second series of quakes has uncovered a massive deposit of Spellstones! Assemble your creatures and fight for control of the peak!

event.name: Spirit Box
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! This week only!

event.name: The Celestial Vault
event.desc: Adventurer's speak of a floating island that moves around the continent. Find it and discover its secrets!

event.name: Basalt Island
event.desc: In the central island is a molten lake of fire and gold. The elementals that live here have been stirred into a frenzy!

event.name: Aerial Depths
event.desc: On the island farthest to the east you find a deep lake with ancient secrets.

event.name: Vault Wars
event.desc: Adventurers have come to the Celestial Vault to steal its treasures. Fight them back and claim them for yourself!

event.name: Champion Box
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards with huge one time box discounts! This week only!

event.name: Journey to the Frog Empire
event.desc: The Frog Empire holds the key to calming the Elementals. Journey through the swamps to discover the empire's secrets!

event.name: Boost Box
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing leveled up cards! This week only!

event.name: The Children of Dawnglow
event.desc: The Guardian Stone is almost in your grasp! Gather the frog eggs around Dawnglow to earn the Emperor's trust.

event.name: Hallowed Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing leveled up cards! This week only!

event.name: The Emperor's Quandary
event.desc: The children of Dawnglow are safe. Return to the Emperor to collect the Guardian Stone and calm the Elementals!

event.name: Earthquake Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Zolmosh the Fist card!

event.name: Battle of the Frogs
event.desc: News has spread that the Emperor has been injured. Adventures have come to raid his treasures! Get what you can before it's too late.

event.name: Frostfire Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Frostfire Wyrm card!

event.name: Tarragon Peak
event.desc: You receive a plea for help as calamity strikes the dragon home of Tarragon Peak!

event.name: Frostjaw Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Frostjaw card!

event.name: Dragon's Deceit
event.desc: Treasure and betrayal await you in the second chapter of Tarragon Peak!

event.name: Black Knight Box
event.desc: The Black Knight has come with some amazing cards!

event.name: Ruination Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Bane Dragon card!

event.name: The Dragon Egg
event.desc: A second quake strikes, leaving the fate of the peak in question. Find the rare Dragon's Egg and hatch a dragon of your own!

event.name: Mystical Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Kitsune card!

event.name: The Final Quake
event.desc: A final massive quake hits Tarragon Peak, opening up a rift in the lava lake at it's base.

event.name: Hallowed Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing leveled up cards! Back by popular demand for a limited time!

event.name: Northern War Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Northern War-kin card!

event.name: Frigore
event.desc: Oda and Malchior arrive in Frigore. They explore the region as strange lights appear in the area.

event.name: Battle Torn Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Brahmet card!

event.name: Arcane Rush
event.desc: Frigore is filled with Arcane Vapor! Help Malchior and Oda collect as much as they can; for science!

event.name: Nidhogg Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Nidhogg card!

event.name: Monster Madness
event.desc: The Arcane Vapor is making creatures appear out of thin air! Help Malchior complete his experiments and keep him safe from danger!

event.name: Hail Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Hail Hurler card!

event.name: Mad Science
event.desc: Malchior's experiments are starting to get out of hand! A tremble can be felt throughout Frigore...

event.name: Pharaoh's Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Mumohotep card!

event.name: To the Center of The Void
event.desc: Tarian and Malchior head to the Center of The Void. They explore the region to uncover Arcantica's mysterious past.

event.name: Dauntless Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Dauntless Baneblade card!

event.name: Rise of the Machines
event.desc: Mysterious technology lies in The Void. Malchior and Tarian continue their search to find its creator.

event.name: Bane Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Bane card!

event.name: What Science has Wrought
event.desc: An abandoned building is seen on the horizon. The secrets to Arcantica's past lie inside!

event.name: Deathweb Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Keeper of Souls card!

event.name: Gravestone Manor
event.desc: Malchior and Tarian have made it to Gravestone Manor. Find what lies inside!

event.name: Monarch Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Celestial Monarch card!

event.name: Sky Top Sanctuary
event.desc: Samael and Yuriel have been called to the Queen's Court in Skyhaven. They begin their journey to the sanctuary in the sky!

event.name: Auroch Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Auroch card!

event.name: The Queen's Court
event.desc: Samael and Yuriel arrive in Skyhaven. The Queen summons them to talk about the event at The Center of The Void...

event.name: Giant's Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Winged Giant card!

event.name: Lost Airship
event.desc: The Queen asks Samael and Yuriel to investigate a crashed airship. Strange technology may lie in the wreck.

event.name: Angel Burst Chance Pack
event.desc: Limited time ALL ANGEL Chance Pack! Check it out before it disappears!

event.name: Tinkerer's Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Tinker card!

event.name: Pandora's Box
event.desc: The technology has been recovered from the airship. Will Samael hand it over to the Queen?

event.name: Sandstorm Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Sandstorm card!

event.name: Decim's Training Day
event.desc: Decim is having trouble controlling his power and is burning down villages! Help Rayne train him in the Celestial Vault!

event.name: Rose Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Highborn Rose card!

root.event: 5034 Wild Fire Rayne takes Decim to Water Island in the Celestial Vault. event.name: Anima Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Highborn Rose card!

event.name: Elemental Burst Chance Pack
event.desc: Limited time ALL ELEMENTAL Chance Pack! Check it out before it disappears!

event.name: Breath of Fire
event.desc: Decim is slowly improving his abilities. Rayne thinks he should take his training to the next level!

event.name: Marble Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Joryl card!

event.name: Fire Master
event.desc: Decim has reached his last leg of training with Rayne! It's time for the final test of his abilities!

event.name: A Very Serious Matter
event.desc: In the deepest deep depths of a land of gloomy gloom, our heroes must find the true meaning of friendship.

event.name: Elemental Burst Chance Pack
event.desc: Limited time ALL ELEMENTAL Chance Pack! Check it out before it disappears!

event.name: Bogskull Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Bogskull Widow card!

event.name: Departure from Golden Crown
event.desc: Ol' Cedric gathers the last of his things from his hometown. He begins his journey to help defeat The Void!

event.name: Bulwraag Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Bulwraag card!

event.name: The Red Banquet
event.desc: A feast has been prepared in Cedric's honor! Before Cedric and Ursurio depart, they enjoy Golden Crown's finest delicacies!

event.name: Bounding Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Boundtoad card!

event.name: Avian Surprise
event.desc: During the banquet, the leader of Golden Crown's son gets kidnapped! Ol'Cedric and Ursurio rush to save him!

event.name: Frog Burst Chance Pack
event.desc: Limited time ALL FROG Chance Pack! Check it out before it disappears!

event.name: Ballista Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Reckless Ballista card!

event.name: Into the Sunset
event.desc: Cedric and Ursurio are closing in on the Avian Soldiers. They must catch them before they escape Golden Crown!

event.name: Galewing Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Galewing card!

event.name: Avian Escape
event.desc: The Avian Soldiers have escaped with the young frog, Frobert! Help Cedric and Ursurio find him!

event.name: Gorger Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Squire Gorger card!

event.name: Can't Stop Won't Stop
event.desc: Cedric and Ursurio make their way to Red Feather Valley, city of the Avians!

event.name: Webtalon Limited Cache
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Each card has only one copy per Cache, but the entire Cache can be purchased up to 4 times!

event.name: Foremost Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new Kaliri the Foremost card!

event.name: Red Feather Valley
event.desc: Cedric and Ursurio explore Red Feather Valley and investigate the Avian Capital!

event.name: Great Depths Chance Pack
event.desc: Pull from an assortment of amazing cards! Features the new The Thing Below card!

event.name: To the Magistrate
event.desc: Cedric and Ursurio rush to the Magistrate's Quarters. Help them investigate the kidnapping of Frobert!

event.desc: Mechas gain base Ward 3 and other abilities based on faction! Aether also gain Legion 3, Chaos gain Barrage 4, and Wyld gain Venom 3. They add their delay cost to all these values.

event.desc: Dragons gain skills based on their Delay (D)! 0D gain Scorch 4, 1D gain Scorch 5, 2D gain Scorch 6, 3D gain Regenerate 8, and 4D gain Regenerate 9.

event.desc: Insects are ready to crawl back into the fight! They gain skills based on their Delay (D)! 0D gain Berserk 3, 1D Berserk 4, 2D Berserk 5, 3D Armor 5, 4D Armor 6.

event.desc: Deals damage to opposing creature and then heals self, even while on delay. Damage and heal are equal to 5% plus 3 of the card’s base Health. This damage cannot be increased.

event.desc: All Seafolk gain barrier equal to 20% of their base health. Delay 0-2 Seafolk also deal bonus damage in their first attack equal to 10% of their base health and pierce equal to their base attack.

event.name: Blinding Radiance
event.desc: Terrible light surrounds all Angels! They gain Invisibility 2. Additionally, Delay 0-2 Angels gain Legion Equal to 15% of their base health, while Delay 3 and 4 gain Emberhide 4 and 6 respectively.

event.name: Radioactive Biosteel
event.desc: Mechas developed a toxic offense/defense mechanism! They gain base Regenerate and Ward equal to 15% of their base health and other abilities based on Delay! D0-2 gains Venom 3+Delay, while D3 and 4 get Poisonhide 7 and 9 respectively. Viracocha gains both bonuses.

event.name: Lily & Vampiric Spear Formation
event.desc: Frogs enchanted their spears to deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health, while also gaining Pierce and Siphon equal to their base Attack!

event.name: Goblin Battle Kit
event.desc: Active goblins throw bombs equal to their base Attack at the start of each turn. Each bomb deals 1 damage and does not benefit from Hex or Venom. They also regenerate 15% of their base health.

event.name: Elemental Discordance
event.desc: Elementals gain skills based on faction and % of base health! Aether gains Barrier 4+15%, Chaos gains Scorch 20% and Wyld deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 30%. Additionally, Void gets a fixed 4 of Venom, 9 Siphon.

event.name: Unbreakable Waves
event.desc: Seafolk gain base Ward and other skills based on Delay! D0-2 gain Frostbreath and D3-4 Armored. Values gained on each skill are based on base health! Ward and Armor 10%, while Frostbreath is 15%.

event.name: Zenith of Dragons
event.desc: The strongest moment of the day for Dragons! 0-2 Delay gain Scorch equal to 25% of their base Health. Dragons of 3-4 Delay gain Regenerate equal to 15% of their base Health plus 4.

event.name: Exalted Warfare
event.desc: Angels are ready for war, gaining Legion 10% and Unrestricted Fervor 10%. Values gained on each skill are based on base health!

event.name: Evil Eye
event.desc: Avians gain skills by base HP and Delay! They all mark a random target upon first activation, ignoring invisibility and hexing them for 15%. The mark lasts until the target dies. 0-2D will Weaken random targets equal to 15%. 3-4D gain Shroud equal to 10%.

event.name: Counterblast Swarm
event.desc: Insects gain Backlash 2. After dealing Attack damage, permanently increases Attack of the lowest Attack active non-tower ally creature by 15% of the Attacker's base Health. Delay 3-4 Insects get Poisonhide equal to 20% of their base health.

event.desc: Vampirism deals damage to opposing creature and then heals self, even while on delay. Damage and heal are equal to 5% + 3 of the card’s base Health. This damage cannot be increased. Undead with 0-2 delay also gain armor equal to 10% of their base health.

event.name: Elemental Disruption
event.desc: Aether gains Barrier 4+15%, Chaos gains Scorch 20%, Wyld deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 30% and Void gains 20% regeneration. All % are based on base health.

event.desc: Mechas gain Ward equal to 15% of their base health and other abilities based on Delay! D0-2 gains Venom 3+Delay, while D3 and 4 get Poisonhide 7 and 9. Viracocha gains both bonuses.

event.name: Revitalizing Waves
event.desc: Seafolk gain Regenerate and other skills based on Delay! D0-2 gain Frostbreath and D3-4 Armor. Values gained on each skill are equal to 10% of base health!

event.name: Enhanced Battle Kit
event.desc: All goblins gain barrage equal to their base attack, 0-2 Delay goblins gain 15% siphon and 3-4 delay goblins gain 15% ward. Values gained on each skill are based on base health.

event.name: Celestial Voidness
event.desc: All Angels gain barrier 2+15%, 0-2 Delay angel 10% legion and 3-4 delay angel 10% weaken. 0-2 Delay voids gain 3+10% Siphon and 3-4 delay voids gain 3+10% Regenerate. Values gained on each skill are based on base health!.

event.name: Celestial Raid
event.desc: All Angels gain barrier equal to 2 plus 15%, 0-2 Delay angel gain 10% legion and 3-4 delay angel gain 10% weaken. Values gained on each skill are based on base health.

event.name: Deadly Sting
event.desc: 0-2 Delay Insects gain 2+10% venom and 3+20% Pierce and 3-4 delay Insect gain 2+10% corrosive and 2+7% vengeance. Values gained on each skill are based on base health!.

event.name: Flaming Scales
event.desc: All Dragons gain invisibility equal to 3, 0-2 Delay Dragons gain 2 plus 10% scorch and 3-4 delay Dragons gain 15% Emberhide. Values gained on each skill are based on base health.

event.name: Lily & Vampiric Spear Formation Reinforced
event.desc: Frogs deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 25% of their base Health, while also gaining Pierce equal to their base Attack and Siphon as 3 plus their Attack.!

event.name: Sky Destruction
event.desc: All Avians gain 2+delay Vengeance. Avian of 0-2 delay deal extra damage on their first attack each turn equal to 40% of their base Attack. Avians of 3-4 delay gain Shroud equal to 10% +2 of their base Health.

event.name: Reinforced Undead Vampirism
event.desc: All undeads receive Vampirism to 5% + 3. 0-2 delay also gain armor equal to 10%. All values based on Health

event.name: Steel's Edge V2.0
event.desc: All Mechas gain base Ward 3 + Delay, and increase their Attack by 15% of their base Health.

event.name: Thriving Swarm
event.desc: All Insects gain extra Health equal to 10% of their base Health and Swarm equal to 15% of their base health. After dealing Attack damage, Swarm permanently increases the Attack of the weakest ally.

event.name: Goblin Civil War
event.desc: All Goblins gain 10% Armor. Aether gain 7% + Delay Frostbreath, Chaos gain 20% + Delay Barrage, Wyld gain 10% + Delay Venom, Void gain Siphon equal to base Attack. Values are based on base health.

event.name: Elemental Meltdown
event.desc: All Elementals are Enraged for 7% base health. 0-2D gain Weaken and Pierce equal to 15%, and 3-4D Elementals gain Shroud and Vengeance equal to 10% base health.

event.name: Eye of the Maelstrom
event.desc: All Seafolk gain Mark equal to 15% base health. 3-4D Seafolk also gain Regenerate for 15% base health.
